name: Head Guard
flavor: A seasoned guard with a mace, a whistle, and a bellowing voice.

features.name: Rally Guards - Action
features.desc: Spend 2 Fear to spotlight the Head Guard and up to 2d4 allies within Far range.

features.name: On My Signal - Reaction
features.desc: Countdown (5). When the Head Guard is in the spotlight for the first time, activate the countdown. It ticks down when a PC makes an attack roll. When it triggers, all Archer Guards within Far range make a standard attack with advantage against the nearest target within their range. If any attacks succeed on the same target, combine their damage.

features.name: Momentum - Reaction
features.desc: When the Head Guard makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.
